R0_StudyID.name: StudyID
R0_StudyID.description: Unique 6-digit identifier for each participant in the study.

R0_InfertilityPeriod.name: Q5_1_1_1
R0_InfertilityPeriod.question: Was there ever a time as long as a year or more when you tried to get pregnant, but did not?
enumDescriptions: null: No information on the participant's infertility.

R0_InfertilityAge.name: Q5_1_2
R0_InfertilityAge.question: If yes, how old were you when you tried to get pregnant but couldn't?

R0_InfertilityDiagnosis.name: Q5_2_1_1
R0_InfertilityDiagnosis.question: Have you ever been told by a doctor that you or your partner had an infertility problem?
R0_InfertilityDiagnosis.description: Did the doctor diagnose the participant with infertility problems.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on the participant's infertility diagnosis.

R0_InfertilityReason.name: Q5_2_2_1
R0_InfertilityReason.question: If yes, what was the reason for the difficulty in conceiving?
enumDescriptions: 4: Partner had low sperm count or other problem.
null: No information on the participant's difficulty conceiving

R0_InfertilityReasonOther.name: Q5_2_3
R0_InfertilityReasonOther.question: If other reason for difficulty conceiving, please specify.

R0_FertilityDrugs.name: Q5_2_4_1
R0_FertilityDrugs.question: Were you given fertility drugs or hormones to help you conceive?
R0_FertilityDrugs.description: Use of fertility drugs/hormones by the participant.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on the participant's fertiity drugs.

R0_FertilityTreatmentAgeFirst.name: Q5_2_5
R0_FertilityTreatmentAgeFirst.question: At what age were you first treated?
R0_FertilityTreatmentAgeFirst.description: Age at participant's first fertility treatment.

R0_FertilityTreatmentAgeLast.name: Q5_2_6
R0_FertilityTreatmentAgeLast.question: At what age were you last treated?
R0_FertilityTreatmentAgeLast.description: Age at participant's last fertility treatment.

R0_EverPregnant.name: Q5_3_1
R0_EverPregnant.question: Have you ever been pregnant?
R0_EverPregnant.description: Whether or not the participant has ever been pregnant.
enumDescriptions: null: No informat whether participant was ever pregnant.

R0_TotalPregnancies.name: Q5_3_2
R0_TotalPregnancies.question: If you have ever been pregnant, how many pregnancies have you had in total?
R0_TotalPregnancies.description: The number of pregnancies the participant has had in total. Maximum is max number of pregnancies in cohort for baseline questionnaire.

R0_CurrentPreg.name: Q5_3_3_1
R0_CurrentPreg.question: Are you currently pregnant?
enumDescriptions: null: No information on whether participant is currently pregnant.

R0_PregnanciesMoreThan6.name: Q5_3_4
R0_PregnanciesMoreThan6.question: If you have had more than 6 pregnancies, cross here.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on whether participant has had 6 or more pregnancies, or they have not had 6 or more pregnancies.

Pregnancies.name: Pregnancies
Pregnancies.description: An array of pregnancy records (up to 13).

R0_Preg_Num.name: R0_Preg_Num
R0_Preg_Num.description: PregnancyID of the participant's pregnancy. Used to differentiate pregnancy data into correct variable naming conventions in post processing of this array.

R0_Preg_Outcome.name: R0_Preg_Outcome
R0_Preg_Outcome.question: Outcome of pregnancy.
R0_Preg_Outcome.description: The outcome of the participant's pregnancy.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on the participant's pregnancy outcome.

R0_Preg_DurationWks.name: R0_Preg_DurationWks
R0_Preg_DurationWks.question: Length of pregnancy (weeks).
R0_Preg_DurationWks.description: Length in weeks of the participant's pregnancy. Maximum set at 54 as longest pregnancy recorded in UK was 375 days.

R0_Preg_SevereVomiting.name: R0_Preg_SevereVomiting
R0_Preg_SevereVomiting.question: Did you ever have severe vomiting in the first 3 months of pregnancy?
R0_Preg_SevereVomiting.description: Whether or not the paricipant suffered from severe vomiting in the first three months of their pregnancy.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on whether the participant had severe vomiting in the first 3 months of the pregnancy.

R0_Preg_Eclampsia.name: R0_Preg_Eclampsia
R0_Preg_Eclampsia.question: Did you suffer from ecplampsia or pre-eclampsia during pregnancy?
R0_Preg_Eclampsia.description: Whether or not the paricipant suffered from eclampsia or pre-eclampsia during their pregnancy.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on whether the participant had eclampsia or pre-eclampsia.

R0_Preg_ChildSex.name: R0_Preg_ChildSex
R0_Preg_ChildSex.question: Sex of child from  pregnancy, if known
R0_Preg_ChildSex.description: The sex of the child, or children, from the participant's pregnancy.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on the sex of the child.

R0_Preg_BirthWghtG.name: R0_Preg_BirthWghtG
R0_Preg_BirthWghtG.question: Birthweight of child from pregnancy, if known. Grams
R0_Preg_BirthWghtG.description: The birthweight of the child from the participant's pregnancy in grams. Maximum set to equivalent of grams for 15 pounds, 8 ounces.

R0_Preg_BirthWghtlbs.name: R0_Preg_BirthWghtlbs
R0_Preg_BirthWghtlbs.question: Birthweight of child from pregnancy, if known. Pounds
R0_Preg_BirthWghtlbs.description: The birthweight of the child from the participant's pregnancy in pounds.. Maximum set at 15 pounds as heaviest recorded birth in UK was 15 pounds, 8 ounces.

R0_Preg_BirthWghtOzs.name: R0_Preg_BirthWghtOzs
R0_Preg_BirthWghtOzs.question: Birthweight of child from pregnancy, if known. Ounces
R0_Preg_BirthWghtOzs.description: The birthweight of the child from the participant's pregnancy in ounces.

R0_Preg_BreastfeedingWks.name: R0_Preg_BreastfeedingWks
R0_Preg_BreastfeedingWks.question: Number of weeks breastfed after pregnancy.
R0_Preg_BreastfeedingWks.description: Number of weeks that the participant breastfed after their pregnancy.

R0_Preg_MilkSuppression.name: R0_Preg_MilkSuppression
R0_Preg_MilkSuppression.question: Did you receive pills or hormone injection to dry up yout milk secretion after pregnancy?
R0_Preg_MilkSuppression.description: Whether or not the paricipant received pills or hormone injections to dry up their milk secretion after their pregnancy.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on whether the participant received pills of hormone injections for milk suppression.

R0_BreastfeedingBreast.name: Q5_22_1
R0_BreastfeedingBreast.question: Which breast did you use for breastfeeding?
R0_BreastfeedingBreast.description: Which breast the participant used for breastfeeding.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on which breast the participant used for breastfeeding.

R0_FirstPregWghtStone.name: Q5_23_ST
R0_FirstPregWghtStone.question: What was your weight at the beginning of your first pregnancy? Stone.
R0_FirstPregWghtStone.description: The participant's weight in stone at the start of their first pregnancy. Maximum set at 48 as heaviest recorded woman UK was 48 stone.

R0_FirstPregWghtlbs.name: Q5_23_LB
R0_FirstPregWghtlbs.question: What was your weight at the beginning of your first pregnancy? Pounds.
R0_FirstPregWghtlbs.description: The participant's weight in pounds at the start of their first pregnancy. This variale works in conjunction with stone. Every increase of 14 pounds is another stone.

R0_FirstPregWghtKG.name: Q5_23_KG
R0_FirstPregWghtKG.question: What was your weight at the beginning of your first pregnancy? Kilograms.
R0_FirstPregWghtKG.description: The participant's weight in kilograms at the start of their first pregnancy. Maximum set at 305 as heaviest recorded woman UK was 48 stone.

R0_LastPregWghtStone.name: Q5_24_ST
R0_LastPregWghtStone.question: What was your weight at the beginning of your last pregnancy? Stone.
R0_LastPregWghtStone.description: The participant's weight in stone at the start of their last pregnancy. Maximum set at 48 as heaviest recorded woman UK was 48 stone.

R0_LastPregWghtlbs.name: Q5_24_LB
R0_LastPregWghtlbs.question: What was your weight at the beginning of your last pregnancy? Pounds.
R0_LastPregWghtlbs.description: The participant's weight in pounds at the start of their last pregnancy. This variale works in conjunction with stone. Every increase of 14 pounds is another stone.

R0_LastPregWghtKG.name: Q5_24_KG
R0_LastPregWghtKG.question: What was your weight at the beginning of your last pregnancy? Kilograms.
R0_LastPregWghtKG.description: The participant's weight in kilograms at the start of their last pregnancy. Maximum set at 305 as heaviest recorded woman UK was 48 stone.

R0_PregHrmns.name: Q5_25_1
R0_PregHrmns.question: Have you ever taken hormones to maintain a pregnancy?
R0_PregHrmns.description: Whether the participant took hormones to maintain a pregnancy.
enumDescriptions: null: No information on whether the participant has ever taken hormones to maintain a pregnancy.

R0_PregHrmnsAge.name: Q5_25age
R0_PregHrmnsAge.question: If yes, at what age were you treated with hormones during pregnancy?
R0_PregHrmnsAge.description: The participant's age when treated with hormones during pregnancy.
